text: Transformers use self-attention to model relationships between tokens.
DistilBERT is a smaller, faster model distilled from BERT.
Semantic search uses embeddings to retrieve meaningfully similar documents.
Kubernetes deployments manage replicas, rollouts, and health probes.
FastAPI builds APIs in Python using type hints and automatic validation.
Minikube runs a local Kubernetes cluster for development.
Cosine similarity measures the angle between two vectors.
A reverse proxy sits in front of application servers to route and secure traffic.
